          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The alchemist's quest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Suche des Alchemisten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La recherche de l'alchimiste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O quest do alquimista</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La ricerca del alchemist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αναζήτηση του αλχημιστή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La búsqueda del alquimista</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the belief of alchemists that with the right combination of the four elements, lead can be transformed into gold.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alchemist's quest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">four elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lead</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wind</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Glauben der 
Alchemisten, die mit der rechten Kombination der vier Elemente, 
Leitung in Gold umgewandelt werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la croyance des 
alchimistes qui avec la bonne combinaison des quatre éléments, fil 
de sortie peuvent être transformés en or.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a opinião dos 
alquimistas que com a combinação direita dos quatro elementos, 
ligação podem ser transformados no ouro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la credenza dei 
alchemists che con la giusta combinazione dei quattro elementi, cavo 
possono essere trasformati in oro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την πεποίθηση των 
αλχημιστών ότι με το σωστό συνδυασμό των τεσσάρων στοιχείων, ο 
μόλυβδος μπορεί να μετασχηματιστεί στο χρυσό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la creencia de los 
alquimistas que con la combinación derecha de los cuatro elementos, 
terminal de componente pueden ser transformados en el oro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Suche des Alchemisten</string>
